alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wilkinson, southeastern Bibb, Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Huber, or 10 miles southeast of Macon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Jeffersonville, Warner Robins, Centerville, Robins AFB, Marion, Tarversville, Robins Air Force Base, Bullard, Rutland, Fitzpatrick, Ripley, Huber, District Path, Dry Branch, Myricks Mill, Elberta, Franklinton, Middle Georgia Regional Airport, and Bonaire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
